radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: X-rays of the pelvis and femurs
radiographic_examinations.findings: Pseudofractures on the lateral aspects of proximal femora bilaterally.
Pseudofracture of the right femur was now visible after having completely healed.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Complete healing of the pseudofracture of the right femur occurred after 8 months of treatment, and bony callus was apparent on the left.
